Following the focus group discussions and key informant interview as well as based on related literature, a paper survey questionnaire was formulated. The questions “resilience-of-what?”, “resilience-to-what?” and “resilience-with-what?” were also used in the household survey paper. A simple random sampling technique was employed to select study participants from the list of farming communities living in Dinki watershed. Selection of household members involves (i) receiving the list of N population in each agro-ecology from respective village administrators; (ii) calculating sample size n; (iii) providing sequential number for each N household and (iv) picking of a household from the list of N population using a lottery method [ 34].
